DataElement.preferredName: Modified Functional Oral Intake Scale Level Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An observation of the level of oral intake abilities using the modified functional oral intake scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Functional Oral Intake Scale Level
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A modified version of the Functional Oral Intake Scale, a measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia.:A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A modified version of the Functional Oral Intake Scale, a measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia.

Concepts.definition: A modified version of the Functional Oral Intake Scale, a measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia.

Property.preferredDefinition: A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.  (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A position on a scale measuring intensity, quality, or amount.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes: 2023.11.29 Created per ticket request CADSR0003038. ak

ValueDomain.preferredName: Modified Functional Oral Intake Scale Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A modified version of the Functional Oral Intake Scale, a measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Takes Nothing by Mouth, Non-nutritive Sucking/Dummy Dips/Mouthcare Only
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is unable to take any foods or liquids by mouth, with only non-nutritive sucking, dummy dips, and mouthcare.

Concepts.longName: Takes Nothing by Mouth, Non-nutritive Sucking/Dummy Dips/Mouthcare Only
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is unable to take any foods or liquids by mouth, with only non-nutritive sucking, dummy dips, and mouthcare.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Tube Dependent with Minimal Oral Intake for Experience or Pleasure
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is tube dependent for all nutrition/hydration needs with minimal attempts at oral intake for experience and/or pleasure.

Concepts.longName: Tube Dependent with Minimal Oral Intake for Experience or Pleasure
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is tube dependent for all nutrition/hydration needs with minimal attempts at oral intake for experience and/or pleasure.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Total Oral Intake, Special Preparation Required
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual can meet their total nutrition and fluid needs orally, but the food/fluids requires special preparation (e.g. thickened fluids, pureed diet).

Concepts.longName: Total Oral Intake, Special Preparation Required
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual can meet their total nutrition and fluid needs orally, but the food/fluids requires special preparation (e.g. thickened fluids, pureed diet).

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Total Oral Intake, Special Conditions or Modifications Required
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual can meet their total nutrition and fluid needs orally, but they require special dining conditions and/or modifications (e.g. slow flow teat/side lying pacing) or have specific food limitations (e.g. soft or fork mashable diet).

Concepts.longName: Total Oral Intake, Special Conditions or Modifications Required
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual can meet their total nutrition and fluid needs orally, but they require special dining conditions and/or modifications (e.g. slow flow teat/side lying pacing) or have specific food limitations (e.g. soft or fork mashable diet).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual can meet their total nutrition and fluid needs orally without restrictions, eating age-appropriate food and drink.

Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual can meet their total nutrition and fluid needs orally without restrictions, eating age-appropriate food and drink.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 7/8/22 added alt name of NA for CCTG cjl;

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Tube Dependent with Consistent Oral Intake to Meet Some Nutrition/Hydration Needs
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is tube dependent, but with consistent intake of food and/or fluid that meets some nutrition/hydration needs.

Concepts.longName: Tube Dependent with Consistent Oral Intake to Meet Some Nutrition/Hydration Needs
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is tube dependent, but with consistent intake of food and/or fluid that meets some nutrition/hydration needs.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A modified version of the Functional Oral Intake Scale, a measure to assess functional oral intake of food and liquids in patients with oropharyngeal dysphagia._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
